attributes.additional_details:
The government do not appear to be listening to the British people.
It's time we had a government that will listen and act on the requirements of the citizens of the United Kingdom
attributes.background: Hold a General Election before April 2026.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
